name: GM Capital Partners
overview:
GM Capital Partners Ltd. is a leading provider of emerging growth investment opportunities for sophisticated investment portfolios.

Our Company is domiciled in Road Town, Tortola, British Virgin Islands. We have access to an international team and global network of advisors that allows us to uncover and develop unique investment opportunities in alternative asset classes.

GM Capital Partners Ltd. offers investors a unique investment opportunity in emerging growth companies.

funding_round.source_description: Article: Sequence Closes $5.3 Million Funding Round; Expands Into Fast-Growing International Markets, Boosts R&D To Maintain Low-Power Tech Lead.
SAN FRANCISCO--- VONTU INCREASES TOTAL FUNDING TO $25M WITH ADDITIONAL $10M IN THIRD ROUND THAT INCLUDES GM CAPITAL PARTNERS
